alert.note: Alert for City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; Gloucester; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 17 at 8:15PM EDT until October 17 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GLOUCESTER...AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES...THE NORTHERN CITY OF POQUOSON AND THE NORTH CENTRAL CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 815 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seaford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Gloucester, and southeastern York Counties, the northern City of Poquoson and the north central City of Newport News, including the following locations... Dare, Lackey, Severn, Glass, Maryus, Hornsbyville, Harris Grove, U.s. Naval Weapons and Yorktown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; Gloucester; York
